core.defaultconfig: [Challenges] Found no map-specific configuration for {mapName}, using default one!
core.noconfig: [Challenges] No map-specific configuration for {mapName} or default one found. Skipping!
core.faultyconfig: [Challenges] Faulty configuration {config}! Skipping! Make sure to fix it because a default config will be generated and a backup configuration will be kept: {error}
command.notalive: [Challenges] you need to be alive to see your stats.
